attributes.additional_details:
To supply those on the electoral roll with a user name and password leading to a web page where they can select their Councillor, Local MP.

 As a result things will be done faster. Booths will still remain open, I.e in job centres and schools.

Therefore an element of mixing and meeting people will continue.

This can be sold and rolled out to other countries and it could also be used as s census or referendum tool.
